channel.title: [Skillscape 667] [24/7]
channel.description:
[B][I]How to Play![/I][/B] [url=http://play.skillscape.org]Webclient[/url] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/rz7mgd7gf6158fa/SkillScape.jar]Downloadable Client[/url] [url=http://skillscape.org/runescape/]Website[/url] (Don't click anything and just wait in order to see a video of the owner show you around) [url=http://runescape.skillscape.org/forums/]Forums[/url] (You must create an account and login to see the full forums)
~I am NOT the owner of this server, I am a moderator. My ingame name is Arcturus, add me and feel free to message me if you need help with something. ~Fully working Bosses, Clan Wars, Soul Wars, G.E. and under active development. ~BEST server I've ever played hands down, great staff & great players. Give it a shot you won't regret it!
[B][I]Skillscape Images![/I][/B] (The description/explanation is the text above each picture)
[B][I]Skillscape Home:[/I][/B] Shops, NPC Teleports, Altars, a Bank and The [U](Functional)[/U] Grand Exchange is located here.
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50516PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50516PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Full Screen/Dungeoneering:[/I][/B] Full screen works, except my computer can't handle it. And fully working dungeoneering!!
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/dungeon2.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/dungeon2.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/dungeon.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/dungeon.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Video showing you guys around home by Mod Harley:[/I][/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-1_10mDvHw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-1_10mDvHw[/url]
[B][I]Commands:[/I][/B] Do ::cmd to see a full list of commands you can use
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50836PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50836PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Mr. Ex Teleports:[/I][/B] Talk to Mr. Ex for these teleports: Duel Arena, Gnome Agility, Dominion Tower, Barrows, Brimhaven, Corp, Feldip Hills, Crabs, KBD, Dragons, Abyss, Mine Essence, and Pure Training.
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50601PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50601PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]PvP Teleports, Shops & Summoning Obelisk:[/I][/B] Talk to lucien (the massive monster towering over everything) for these PvP teleports: Magic Bank, Multi Area, Fight pits, Wests, Easts, & Edgeville. The shops are everyone besides lucien and the obelisk. (Although I usually just buy my items in the grand exchange because it has just about every single item and is quicker than searching through shops) For the summoning obelisk you'll need pouches, spirit shards, gold charms, red charms, wolf bones and evil turnips. Make spirit wolves until you are around level 50 and from there make evil turnips. Bam 99 summoning!
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50939PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at50939PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Fully Working Bosses:[/I][/B] All bosses are fully working, bosses are in either accessed by ::cmd, or by Mr. Ex (See above). Below are my favorite two, the Queen Black Dragon and Nex. On our forums you can find an excellent guide on how to solo nex by one of our mods, Derp.
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at51946PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at51946PM.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at52038PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at52038PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Nex Drops:[/I][/B] Yep you guessed it! Torva, Virtus and Pernix
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at63118PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at63118PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Duel Arena:[/I][/B] (Me owning Ohh hi der)
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at52724PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at52724PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Pking:[/I][/B] (Cannon Spec owning Range Tank for the 38th time hahaha)
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at53449PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at53449PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]Starter Kit & ::train[/I][/B] (There is also ::train2 once you get your levels up)
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at60552PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at60552PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]667 Emotes & Completionist Cape Emote:[/I][/B]
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-29at102915PM.png.html][IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-29at102915PM.png[/img][/URL]
[B][I]All Skills Work!![/I][/B] On a side note, if you want the cute puppy I have talk to the pet shop owner who is directly in front of me. Also, if you want the classic cape, veteran's cape, max cape or completionist cape talk to the guy on my left side.
[URL=http://s1101.photobucket.com/user/YeahboyyyTacoma/media/ScreenShot2013-04-30at11308AM.png.html] [IMG]http://i1101.photobucket.com/albums/g421/YeahboyyyTacoma/ScreenShot2013-04-30at11308AM.png[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt][font=comic sans ms]There is so much more to do on Skillscape! I haven't even shown a fraction of it! Come on everyone join us over at Skillscape!!!![/font][/size]

item.title: [Skillscape 667] [24/7]
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcturus The Arcturus
item.description:
@The_Arcturus wrote:

How to Play!
Webclient
Downloadable Client
Website (Don’t click anything and just wait in order to see a video of the owner show you around)
Forums (You must create an account and login to see the full forums)

~I am NOT the owner of this server, I am a moderator. My ingame name is Arcturus, add me and feel free to message me if you need help with something.
~Fully working Bosses, Clan Wars, Soul Wars, G.E. and under active development.
~BEST server I’ve ever played hands down, great staff & great players. Give it a shot you won’t regret it!

Skillscape Images! (The description/explanation is the text above each picture)

Skillscape Home: Shops, NPC Teleports, Altars, a Bank and The U[/U] Grand Exchange is located here.

Full Screen/Dungeoneering: Full screen works, except my computer can’t handle it. And fully working dungeoneering!!

Video showing you guys around home by Mod Harley:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v-1_10mDvHw

Commands: Do ::cmd to see a full list of commands you can use

Mr. Ex Teleports: Talk to Mr. Ex for these teleports: Duel Arena, Gnome Agility, Dominion Tower, Barrows, Brimhaven, Corp, Feldip Hills, Crabs, KBD, Dragons, Abyss, Mine Essence, and Pure Training.

PvP Teleports, Shops & Summoning Obelisk: Talk to lucien (the massive monster towering over everything) for these PvP teleports: Magic Bank, Multi Area, Fight pits, Wests, Easts, & Edgeville. The shops are everyone besides lucien and the obelisk. (Although I usually just buy my items in the grand exchange because it has just about every single item and is quicker than searching through shops) For the summoning obelisk you’ll need pouches, spirit shards, gold charms, red charms, wolf bones and evil turnips. Make spirit wolves until you are around level 50 and from there make evil turnips. Bam 99 summoning!

Fully Working Bosses: All bosses are fully working, bosses are in either accessed by ::cmd, or by Mr. Ex (See above). Below are my favorite two, the Queen Black Dragon and Nex. On our forums you can find an excellent guide on how to solo nex by one of our mods, Derp.

Nex Drops: Yep you guessed it! Torva, Virtus and Pernix

Duel Arena: (Me owning Ohh hi der)

Pking: (Cannon Spec owning Range Tank for the 38th time hahaha)

Starter Kit & ::train (There is also ::train2 once you get your levels up)

667 Emotes & Completionist Cape Emote:

All Skills Work!! On a side note, if you want the cute puppy I have talk to the pet shop owner who is directly in front of me. Also, if you want the classic cape, veteran’s cape, max cape or completionist cape talk to the guy on my left side.


[size=18pt][font=comic sans ms]There is so much more to do on Skillscape! I haven’t even shown a fraction of it! Come on everyone join us over at Skillscape!!![/font][/size]

Read full topic
